Hagop

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope this email finds you doing well.

 

With reference to our fruitful joint meeting last week, kindly find below herewith GIG’s feedback which are self-explanatory:

 

QUOTE”

The premium rate structure for Stocks in Warehouses under Marine STP has been based on the overall stock value since the inception of Marine STP program's in 2021.

 

Premium applicable as per the current terms, on Stocks under both STP & PAR policies:



 

Based on our client’s request during our meeting, we are pleased to amend the terms as follows

      

            Premium Rate(s):- Marine STP

                Warehouses

Current

Revised

Cover Rate

0.280%

---

LTA Rate

0.249%

0.350%

*         Premium to be booked on a proportional basis up to the primary layer limit of $15 million under Marine STP program.

 

PAR Policy: No Change

*         On stock value in excess of $15m, a premium rate of 0.249% will be applied under PAR policy.

 

For you quick reference, see below revised premium computation applicable on Stocks under both Property & Marine STP

 



 

Kindly confirm insured’s agreement on above to endorse the policy and adjust the premium accordingly.

“UNQUOTE

 

Hope the above would be in order and looking forward for your confirmation to proceed accordingly.

 

Best Regards,

 

Saad AlMaghazwi,

General Lines Operations Director

Dear Hagop,

  

Hope this email finds you doing well.

  

With reference to our fruitful joint meeting last week, kindly find below herewith GIG’s feedback which are self-explanatory:

  

QUOTE”

The premium rate structure for Stocks in Warehouses under Marine STP has been based on the overall stock value since the inception of Marine STP program's in 2021.

 

Premium applicable as per the current terms, on Stocks under both STP & PAR policies:



  

Based on our client’s request during our meeting, we are pleased to amend the terms as follows

      

            Premium Rate(s):- Marine STP

                Warehouses

Current

Revised

Cover Rate

0.280%

---

LTA Rate

0.249%

0.350%

*         Premium to be booked on a proportional basis up to the primary layer limit of $15 million under Marine STP program.

 

PAR Policy: No Change

*         On stock value in excess of $15m, a premium rate of 0.249% will be applied under PAR policy.

  

For you quick reference, see below revised premium computation applicable on Stocks under both Property & Marine STP

 



 

Kindly confirm insured’s agreement on above to endorse the policy and adjust the premium accordingly.

“UNQUOTE

  

Hope the above would be in order and looking forward for your confirmation to proceed accordingly.

  

Best Regards,

 

Saad AlMaghazwi,

General Lines Operations Director
